member.name: LineCap
member.summary: The LineCap enumeration specifies the type of graphic shape to use on the end of a line drawn with a Windows GDI+ pen. The cap can be a square, circle, triangle, arrowhead, custom, or masked (hidden). End caps can also "anchor" the line by centering the cap at the end of the line.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapFlat
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends at the last point. The end is squared off.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapSquare
member.summary: Specifies a square cap. The center of the square is the last point in the line. The height and width of the square are the line width.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapRound
member.summary: Specifies a circular cap. The center of the circle is the last point in the line. The diameter of the circle is the line width.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapTriangle
member.summary: Specifies a triangular cap. The base of the triangle is the last point in the line. The base of the triangle is the line width.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapNoAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are not anchored.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapSquareAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are anchored with a square. The center of the square is the last point in the line. The height and width of the square are the line width.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapRoundAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are anchored with a circle. The center of the circle is at the last point in the line. The circle is wider than the line.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapDiamondAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are anchored with a diamond (a square turned at 45 degrees). The center of the diamond is at the last point in the line. The diamond is wider than the line.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapArrowAnchor
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are anchored with arrowheads. The arrowhead point is located at the last point in the line. The arrowhead is wider than the line.

member.name: LineCap.LineCapCustom
member.summary: Specifies that the line ends are made from aCustomLineCap.
